description.narrative: The project aims to promote public budget transparency, accountability and people participation (BTAP) in Vietnam in order to enhance development outcomes for women and men from marginalized communities in the provinces of Hoa Binh and Quang Tri. In partnership with three co-applicant organizations, Oxfam will work in Hoa Binh and Quang Tri provinces to support target groups at communal, district and provincial levels. Oxfam will be legally, technically and administratively responsible for the project and for providing overall management and technical support. It will have a strategic role, maintaining a clear direction of the broader policy and governance objectives, and strengthening the capacity of Vietnamese CSOs through the linkage of actors, coalitions and networks from local to global levels.

participating-org.narrative: Action to the Community Development Center (ACDC) is a Vietnamese non-governmental organization working for Persons with disabilities of Vietnam. The center has an official legal status according to the Decision 857/QD-TWH under the management of Central Association Scientific Research on Southeast Asia of Vietnam that was permitted to operate by the Hanoi Department of Science and Technology on 27th December 2011. #WE EXIST FOR THE SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT OF PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES AND THE VULNERABLE IN VIETNAM# is ourmission which is for a barrier-free society and the rights for people with disabilities and other vulnerable groups in Vietnam. Main activities # Capacity building for DPOs, Persons with disabilities#; women with disabilities; and youth with disabilities. # Advising for persons with disabilities and stakeholders on legal; employment; psychology through hotline: 04 6281 1234 # Consulting to government agencies about polices for Persons with disabilities. # Conducting public media on capacity and ability of person with disabilities through various channels such as television, newspapers, magazines, forum, websites# # Researching and suggesting on diversity and work ability of persons with disabilities# # Co-operating with organizations and individuals which have the same mission; tocreate a sustainable development of Persons with disabilities and the vulnerable in the community. # Supporting and promoting the positive efforts of the government and local authorities for publicity, transparency, accountability and the involvement of citizens in the management of the state budget. Connecting with international and organizations which have similar targets With the vision and mission, ACDC Center has closely connected with the international organizations as well as local organizations to achieve the common goals, for instance in international: being a member of the Asia <(>&<)> Pacific Disability Forum(APDF) and rehabilitation network of community-based Asia Pacific (CBR), associating with Asia-Pacific Development Center on Disability (APCD)...; in Vietnam: being the organization operating the network of more than 200 member organizations with disabilities in the country, supporting the group working on disability of the NGOs data center since 2011; is a member of Vietnma Federation on Disability, closely linking with the organizations such as Oxfam, CDI, CECEM, GPAR, local authorities... in the projects on publicity, transparency and the involvementof citizens in the management of the state budget.
Action to the Community Development Center (ACDC)

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation

receiver-org.narrative: Action to the Community Development Center (ACDC)
